Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player.ResourceMarket

Class WhiteMarbleConversion

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Player.ResourceMarket.WhiteMarbleConversion
All Implemented Interfaces:
MarbleHandler, ResourceMarketHandler
public class WhiteMarbleConversion extends Object implements ResourceMarketHandler
Decorator of ResourceMarketHandler. Used to handle white marbles and convert them in SelectableMarble
